thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Sports-Themed Holiday Decoration (CTO-731)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Sports-Themed Holiday Decoration (CTO-731) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Sports-Themed Holiday Decoration (CTO-731)
text:
InventHelp is working to submit this client's idea, TEAM PRIDE, to companies for their review and potential feedback.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 13, 2015
"I am a sports nut and also really love the holiday season," said an inventor from Granby, Conn. "I came up with this idea because it combines the two in a great way."
He developed the patent-pending TEAM PRIDE to show support for a favorite sports team. The item adds a decorative element to the home that makes the holiday season more festive and fun. It features a distinctive novelty design that serves as a conversation piece. The decoration is easy to set up and take down. In addition, the unit is ideal for sports fans.
The original design was submitted to the Connecticut office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-CTO-731, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
